fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.entities.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerDisplay

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent the player and all of his possible actions (moves, directions, ...).

    • Field Summary
